name: USBD
description: Bima BTC: Building USBD for Bitcoin At Bima, we specialize in leveraging your Bitcoin assets, no matter the form, to optimize capital efficiency and drive growth. Our platform offers institutions a powerful solution to increase Total Value Locked (TVL) while accessing retail flow and volume through Yearn-style vaults and lending platforms. These vaults facilitate the seamless integration of USBD—our omni-chain Bitcoin stablecoin—into your Bitcoin-backed strategies, enhancing liquidity and enabling cross-ecosystem utility.
